Description: 2012 GIBSON CUSTOM SHOP LIMITED EDITION LES PAUL CUSTOM FIGURED MAPLE TOP TRANSPARENT BLUE W/ CUSTOM SHOP CASE MINT CONDITION WEIGHS 8 POUNDS 13 OUNCES PLAYED MAYBE 10 HOURS. LIGHT PICK MARKS ON PICKGUARDA FEW LIGHT MARKS (BUFFING ) ON BACK. DARK FINISHES DO SHOW THE MARKS EASIER, BUT THIS IS INDEED MINT CONDITION. SERIAL# CS-202991INCLUDES C.O.A. (SEE PICS)SOLD AS IS NO WARRANTY / SETUP AND INTONATED BEFORE SHIPPING LES PAUL CUSTOM SHOP FEATURES AND SPECS Legendary tone and distinction with a figured maple top that's enhanced by its transparent finish. The Gibson Custom Shop Les Paul Custom Figured Maple Electric Guitar in Trans Blue has a beautifully figured maple top that was hand-selected to be shown off by a transparent finish. The mahogany back shares the same transparent finish. A one-piece mahogany neck and solid mahogany body provide plenty of warm tone. A maple fingerboard adds some bright attack while 490R and 498T Gibson humbuckers deliver warm rhythm and hot, solid lead sounds. Gibson also includes gold hardware in a tune-o-matic bridge and stopbar tailpiece, as well as a bound body, neck, and headstock. FEATURES Hand-picked figured-maple top perfectly highlighted by a transparent finishMatching transparent finish on backMahogany back and one-piece mahogany neck24-3/4" scaleMaple fingerboard1-11/16" nut width22 fretsFigured acrylic block inlaysGold hardware490R neck humbucker with Alnico II magnets498T bridge humbucker with Alnico V magnetsTune-o-matic bridge with stopbar tailpieceTulip tunersBody, neck, and headstock bindingNitrocellulose lacquer finishIncludes Gibson Custom Shop hardshell case
Title: 2012 GIBSON LES PAUL CUSTOM FIGURED MAPLE TRANS BLUE CUSTOM SHOP W/ CASE MINT
